promptPrefix:
I want you to analyse this product sizing table [PROMPT].
First, begin with the table heading (BOLD) "Sizing (International - cm)", create a new table with cm.
Second, begin with the table heading (BOLD) "Sizing (USA - inches)", create a new table with in.
Third, begin with the table heading (BOLD) "Sizing International (cm) and US (inches)", create a table with all cm and in.
Do not tell me what you are doing, simply create the headings and tables.
write all output in [TARGETLANGUAGE]
title: Product Sizing Tables - convert IN~CM
